name: Lone Druid
title: Sylla
lore: Sylla the Lone Druid is one with nature. His spirit bear fights alongside him as a powerful extension of his will.

spiritBear.name: Summon Spirit Bear
spiritBear.description: Summons a powerful spirit bear that can carry items and attack enemies.

spiritLink.name: Spirit Link
spiritLink.description: Lone Druid and his bear share a portion of damage and attack speed.

savageRoar.name: Savage Roar
savageRoar.description: Both Lone Druid and his bear roar, causing nearby enemies to flee in fear.

trueForm.name: True Form
trueForm.description: Transforms into a powerful bear form with bonus HP, armor, and melee attacks.
